nodes.bodyText:
It looks like you can use '\w' in regex which means exactly the same :
[a-zA-Z_0-9 (https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/regex/Pattern.html)
On the other hand, it might not be that obvious for others, so up to you.

In fact, I can not really easily change this, or it will change the message being reported as well. So I'll let it like this, as I don't feel displaying \w in the issue message is nice, and replacing it before printing looks a bit too complex for what it is.
